front.title: Proof of Process (PoP): Forensic Appraisal and Security Model

abstract.t: This document specifies the forensic appraisal methodology and quantitative security model for the Proof of Process (PoP) framework. It defines how Verifiers evaluate behavioral entropy, perform liveness detection, and calculate forgery cost bounds. Additionally, it establishes the taxonomy for Absence Proofs and the Tool Receipt protocol for AI attribution within the linear human authoring process.
